Name: Vijesh
Message: Wishing you very very very very happy birthday. yeapavum siricha mugathoda santhosama iru. Prithivi va nalla poathuko. Life la yeapavumea happy ya jolly ya eru. god bless you and nammaloda beautiful memories na yeanga erunthu soldrathunu therila 2nd year la erunthu final year varaikum and athukappuram nallanchi varusham veara veara companyla veara veara yeaduthula work pannalum nammaloda friendship yeanaikumea same ma erunthirukku. So oru pure oru nalla friendu nee atha neenachi yeanaku pearumaiya eruku santhosama erukku. Athu after marriagejum continue aguthunu neenaikumbothu romba santhosama erukku. Ooty bike trip la ponom with prithivi and arjun yeallam romba happy ya erunthathu. Isha trip athukappuram neeraya beatiful memories in college la eruku athula neenachi pakkumbothu romba santhosama erukku. So antha memories oda yeannaium marakkama yeapaium happy ya eru. Will keep in touch always  bye bye take care.
